alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 2:07PM MDT until April 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches with isolated amounts approaching 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Blaine County. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to Noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
